system.description:
Though not especially common anymore, crossbows were once a widespread form of weapon across the isles. Today, their quiet operation and versatility has them used by highly-skilled specialists rather than soldiers. The ability to operate almost silently makes them valuable when stealth is essential, and they can employ a wide variety of different projectiles for differing effects. Other crossbow-like weapons also exist, from the compact wristbow to the electrically-powered voltaic gun.

Sleep darts inflict the fast asleep truth instead of dealing damage. Incendiary bolts add the burn quality.

Standard bolts cost 4 coin apiece. Sleep darts cost 20 coin each. Incendiary bolts cost 30 coin each.
